name: retrykh,jhk./
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);                                @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   {                  body ol#posts li blockquote,                body.mceContentBody blockquote {                margin-left: 0 !important;                margin-right: 0 !important;                padding-left: 10px !important;                border-width: 4px !important;                border-color: #a8bccf !important;                }                ol#posts li blockquote blockquote,                body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote {                border-color: #ffffff !important;                }                ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote,                body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote {                border-color: #ffffff !important;                }                ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote,                body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote {                border-color: #ffffff !important;                }                ol#posts li blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote,                body.mceContentBody blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote {                border-color: #ffffff !important;                }                #dashboard_index #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;}

div.l-content.l-content.l-content {            background: #1189a7 !important; }                h1 {        color: #666666;        text-shadow: 0 0 3px #ffffff;        }                .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header {        color: #ffffff;        }                img#content_top, img#content_bottom {        display: none;        }                                #nav .nav_item.active {            background: #1189a7 !important;          }                #nav .nav_item .nav_item_nipple .nav_item_nipple_pixel {            background: #1189a7 !important;          }                ol#posts li.notification.alt {            background-color: #1189a7;        }            ol#posts li.notification.single_notification { background-color: #1189a7;     border-bottom: 1px solid #1189a7; border-top: 1px solid #1189a7; border-left: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-right: 1px solid #1189a7;}    ol#posts li.notification.first_notification {            background-color: #1189a7;     border-bottom: 1px solid #1189a7; border-top: 1px solid #1189a7; border-left: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-right: 1px solid #1189a7;   }                ol#posts li.notification {            background-color: #1189a7;            border-bottom: 1px solid #1189a7; border-top: 1px solid #1189a7; border-left: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-right: 1px solid #1189a7;     }                ol#posts li.notification.last_notification {            border-bottom: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-top: 1px solid #1189a7; border-left: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-right: 1px solid #1189a7;       }                ol#posts li.post .permalink {            background: #1189a7;        }                #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs {        background: #1189a7;        border: solid #ffffff;        }                ol#posts li.post .post_avatar{        border-bottom: 0px solid #ffffff;  border-top: 1px solid #1189a7;      }                #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs .dashboard_controls_suggested_blog {        border-top: 1px solid #1189a7;        border-bottom: 1px solid #1189a7;   border-left: 1px solid #1189a7;  border-right: 1px solid #1189a7;      }                #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover {        background: none;        }                #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current {        background: none;        }                form.dashboard_options_form {        background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);        border-bottom: 1px solid #ffffff;  border-top: 1px solid #ffffff; border-left: 1px solid #ffffff;  border-right: 1px solid #ffffff;       border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px;        border-bottom-left-radius: 10px 10px;        border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px;        border-bottom-right-radius: 10px 10px;        border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px;        border-top-left-radius: 10px 10px;        border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px;        border-top-right-radius: 10px 10px;        color: #ffffff;        display: block;        font-size: 13px;        margin-bottom: 25px;        padding: 15px 22px;        }                form.dashboard_options_form .option_container {        border-top: 1px solid #ffffff;        }                .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header {        color: #666666;        }        }
